categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Render was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer of the Imperial Starfleet. The Render arrived at the factory ZA-13 to relieve Maarek Stele.
The Render's role at this station did not last long, for it was soon replaced, for unknown reasons, by two EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigates.
